H1.text: what is the female lion called in lion king. Sarafina

H3.text: what is the female lion called in lion king. Nala

A4.text: Madge Sinclair as Sarabi, Mufasa's mate, Simba's mother, and leader of the lioness hunting party, as well as the queen of the Pride Lands at the beginning of the film.

A5.text: Zoe Leader as Sarafina, Nala's mother, who is briefly shown talking to Simba's mother, Sarabi.
